content: Could someone let me know the contact details of a person(s) on the Vocabulary group, as I have a question around the correct way to create ValueSet/CodeSystem and ConceptMaps (I have a couple of options that may be too long to explain on the forum!). Many thanks
It's probably easiest to just put it on the vocabulary stream here. Those on that stream don't mind long posts. Or long discussions :)

Dave, we're happy to help. It's actually the terminology stream, but I agree with Lloyd that is the place to post it. Not quite sure whether we mind long posts and discussions or not, but we are rather familiar with them. :)
